tika-s0304t9:2_1: Veyyattiyaṁ visāradabhāvena. Visāradā nāma tihetukapaṭisandhisiddhasābhāvikapaññā, tāya samannāgatā.
tika-s0304t9:3_0: Acchiddakagaṇanāya kusaloti navantagaṇanāya kusalo. Aṅgulimuddāya gaṇanāya kusaloti
tika-s0304t9:3_1: aṅgulikāya eva gaṇanāya kusalo seyyathāpi pādasikā. Piṇḍagaṇanāyāti saṅkalanapaṭuppannakārino
tika-s0304t9:3_2: piṇḍavasena gaṇanā. Tathāgatoti khīṇāsavo, tathāgataṁ sandhāya pucchatīti khīṇāsavoti
tika-s0304t9:3_3: cassa arahattaphalavasibhāvitakhandhe upādāya ayaṁ paññatti hoti. Tesu khandhesu
tika-s0304t9:3_4: sati khīṇāsavā sattasaṅkhātā hontīti vohārena paññapetuṁ sakkā bhaveyya, asantesu
tika-s0304t9:3_5: na sakkā, tasmā paraṁ maraṇāti vuttattā tesaṁ abhāvā “abyākatameta”nti vuttaṁ. Yadi
tika-s0304t9:3_6: evaṁ tesaṁ abhāvato “na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti puṭṭhāya “āmā”ti paṭijānitabbā
tika-s0304t9:3_7: siyā, taṁ pana sattasaṅkhātassa pucchitattā na paṭiññātanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Yena rūpenāti
tika-s0304t9:3_8: sattatathāgate vuttarūpaṁ sabbaññutathāgate paṭikkhipituṁ “taṁ rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0304t9:3_9: Yaṁ upādāyāti yaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ upādāya. Tadabhāvenāti tassa khandhapañcakassa
tika-s0304t9:3_10: abhāvena. Tassā paññattiyāti sattapaññattiyā abhāvaṁ. Niruddhaṁ na nidasseti.
tika-s0304t9:4: Khemāya theriyā vuttaṁ paṭhamaṁ suttaṁ bhagavato seṭṭhatthadīpanato aggapadāvacaraṁva hotīti vuttaṁ “aggapadasmi”nti.
tika-s0304t9:9: 412-417.Rūpamattanti ettha matta-saddo visesanivattiattho. Ko pana so visesoti? Yo bāhiraparikappito idha tathāgatoti vuccamāno attā. Anupalabbhiyasabhāvoti anupalabbhiyattā.
tika-s0304t9:12_1: Bahūnaṁ kutūhaluppattiṭṭhānatoti yojanā. Yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā gacchatīti agginā
tika-s0304t9:12_2: kappavuṭṭhānakāle gacchati, taṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Imañca kāyanti imaṁ rūpakāyaṁ. Cuticittena
tika-s0304t9:12_3: nikkhipatīti cuticittena bhijjamānena nikkhipati. Cuticittassa hi oraṁ sattarasamassa
tika-s0304t9:12_4: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṁ kammajarūpaṁ cuticittena saddhiṁ nirujjhati, tato
tika-s0304t9:12_5: paraṁ kammajarūpaṁ na uppajjati. Yadi uppajjeyya, maraṇaṁ na siyā, cuticittaṁ rūpaṁ
tika-s0304t9:12_6: na samuṭṭhāpeti, āhārajassa ca asambhavo eva, utujaṁ pana vattateva. Yasmā paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-s0304t9:12_7: satto aññataraṇāya upapajjati nāma, cutikkhaṇe paṭisandhicittaṁ aladdhaṁ aññataraṇāya,
tika-s0304t9:15_0: 419.Tesaṁ laddhiyāti tesaṁ sassatavādānaṁ laddhiyā saddhiṁ etaṁ “atthattā”ti vacanaṁ
tika-s0304t9:15_1: ekaṁ abhavissa. Tato eva anulomaṁ taṁ nābhavissa ñāṇassāti asāraṁ etanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t9:15_2: Api nu metassāti me etassa anattāti vipassanāñāṇassa anulomaṁ api nu abhavissa, vilomakameva tassa siyāti attho.
tika-s0304t9:18_0: 420. Yassapa’ssāti pāṭhassa ayaṁ piṇḍattho “āvuso”tiādi. Tatthāyaṁ sambandho – āvuso,
tika-s0304t9:18_1: yassapi puggalassa tīṇi vassāni vuṭṭho, ettakena kālena “hetumhi sati rūpītiādipaññāpanā
tika-s0304t9:18_2: hoti, asati na hotī”ti ettakaṁ byākaraṇaṁ bhaveyya, tassa puggalassa ettakameva bahu,
tika-s0304t9:18_3: ko pana vādo atikkante! Ito atikkante dhammadesanānaye vādoyeva vattabbameva natthīti
tika-s0304t9:18_4: therassa pañhabyākaraṇaṁ sutvā paribbājako pītisomanassaṁ pavedesi.
